short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a mute button to each subreddit in r/popular for quick muting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mute a Subreddit:
Go to r/popular.
Click the Mute button next to the subreddit you wish to hide.

Manage Muted Subreddits:
Click the SubMute icon in the Chrome toolbar.
View your muted subreddits and click Unmute to remove any.
